mfa_auth_description:
Multi-factor authentication increases the security of your account by requiring a code (from either an SMS or token app/provider) above your normal password for authentication.

Please choose the type of multi-factor authentication you would like to activate on your account.
mfa_auth_enabled:
Multi-factor authentication increases the security of your account by requiring a code (either SMS or from a token provider) above your normal password for authentication.

Multi-factor authentication is enabled on this account.
mfa_sms_description: Please input a mobile number that will be used for SMS multi-factor auth.
local_auth_description: You can secure this log in on this device by using the device’s biometric authentication or setting a pin. This will be reset when logging out or can be changed/disabled in settings.
landing_description: Login or register a new account
individual_group_description: Customers are limited to their own accounts.
disclaimer_text: {{company.name}} is powered by the Rehive App. All funds, activities and support queries are administered by {{company.name}}. Rehive is not responsible for any possible loss of funds that may occur through mismanagement by {{company.name}}.
disable_two_factor_authentication_descri: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication for this device?
mfa_token_verification: Please enter token provided by your multi-factor authentication app
mfa_sms_verification: Please enter the verification code that was sent to {{mobile}}
local_auth_set_biometrics: You can secure this log in on this device by using the device’s biometric authentication or setting a pin. This will be reset when logging out or can be changed/disabled in settings.
local_auth_set: You can secure this log in on this device by setting a pin. This will be reset when logging out or can be changed/disabled in settings.

local_auth_landing_description: Local authentication uses your devices biometric authentication (fingerprint/facial recognition) or a pin to secure your logins and other important actions within the app.
